sense.def:
Izraz
something
uporabimo, kadar zelo nedoločno govorimo o nečem, kar ni oseba, na primer o predmetu, dejanju ali lastnosti.

seg.quote: Hendricks saw something ahead of him.

sense.def:
Kadar za tisto, kar imamo ali smo dosegli, rečemo, da je
something
, hočemo povedati, da je koristno, pa čeprav samo v manjšem obsegu.

seg.quote: Of course I've got my savings now, that's something.

sense.def:
Kadar za osebo ali stvar rečemo, da je
something of a particular thing
, hočemo reči, da ima v sebi tisto v omejenem obsegu.

seg.quote: It is something of a mystery.

sense.def:
Kadar rečemo, da
there is something in an idea or suggestion
, hočemo povedati, da je zamisel ali predlog po našem mnenju še kar dober.

cit.quote: ni tako slabo, ima svoje prednosti

seg.quote: I believe there is something in having ballots in trade unions.
